definitions.body: daughter-in-law, in ref. to husband's father Ge 38:11, Ge 38:16, Ge 38:24 (J), cf. 1Ch 2:4, 1Sa 4:19, Ez Eze 22:11, Mic 7:6, Ge 11:31 (P), Le 18:15, Le 20:12 (both H); husband's mother Ru 1:6, Ru 1:7, Ru 1:8, Ru 1:22, Ru 2:20, Ru 2:22, Ru 4:15.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: just before marriage Is 49:18, Is 61:10, Is 62:5, Je 2:32 (all in sim., etc.), ‖[[חָתָן]] Je 7:34, Je 16:9, Je 25:10, Je 33:11, Joe 2:16; Ct So 4:8, So 4:9, So 4:10, So 4:11, So 4:12, So 5:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: also just after marriage = young wife Ho 4:13, Ho 4:14; rd. [[הַכַּלָּה]] likewise 2Sa 17:3 (for MT [[הַכּׂל]]), LXX We Dr Klo Kit Bu.
